projects.name: Chift
projects.shortDescription: Financial dashboard for modern businesses with real-time analytics and seamless integrations.
projects.fullDescription: Chift is a comprehensive financial dashboard designed for modern businesses that need real-time insights into their financial health. The platform integrates seamlessly with major banking APIs, accounting software, and payment processors to provide a unified view of all financial operations. With intuitive data visualization and customizable reporting, Chift empowers finance teams to make data-driven decisions quickly.
projects.challenge: The client needed a way to consolidate financial data from multiple sources into a single, easy-to-understand dashboard. The existing solution was fragmented and required manual data entry, leading to errors and delays in financial reporting.
projects.solution: We designed and developed a custom financial dashboard that connects directly to banking APIs and accounting software. The automated data sync eliminates manual entry, while the intuitive interface makes financial insights accessible to non-technical team members.
results: 75% reduction in time spent on financial reporting
Real-time visibility into cash flow across 12 accounts
Successful integration with 5 major banking platforms
Adopted by 50+ finance professionals within first month

projects.name: Arche
projects.shortDescription: Architecture studio portfolio showcasing immersive project experiences and spatial design.
projects.fullDescription: Arche is an immersive portfolio website for a forward-thinking architecture studio. The site showcases their most significant projects through cinematic scrolling experiences, interactive floor plans, and high-resolution imagery. Every interaction is designed to reflect the precision and artistry of their architectural work.
projects.challenge: Arche needed a digital presence that matched the quality and sophistication of their physical architecture. Standard portfolio templates couldn't capture the spatial experience they wanted to convey.
projects.solution: We created a custom Webflow site with advanced GSAP animations that guide visitors through each project like a architectural tour. Parallax effects, smooth scrolling, and interactive elements create an immersive experience that reflects their design philosophy.

projects.name: Nexus
projects.shortDescription: E-commerce platform for sustainable brands with custom CMS and membership features.
projects.fullDescription: Nexus is a purpose-built e-commerce platform for sustainable and ethical brands. Beyond standard e-commerce functionality, Nexus includes a membership system for loyal customers, a sustainability scoring system for products, and a content hub for brand storytelling. The platform helps conscious consumers make informed purchasing decisions.
projects.challenge: Sustainable brands struggle to communicate their ethical practices effectively on traditional e-commerce platforms. The client needed a solution that could showcase their sustainability credentials while providing robust e-commerce functionality.
projects.solution: We built a custom Webflow e-commerce platform with Finsweet CMS enhancements. The site features a unique sustainability badge system, detailed product sourcing information, and a membership program that rewards eco-conscious purchases.

projects.name: Verdant
projects.shortDescription: Sustainable marketplace connecting local farmers with urban consumers.

projects.name: Aether
projects.shortDescription: AI-powered analytics platform for marketing teams.

projects.name: Solara
projects.shortDescription: Renewable energy company website with interactive carbon footprint calculator.
